glsa.title: w3m: SSL spoofing vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: An error in the hostname matching of w3m might enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: w3m is a text based WWW browser.

description.p: A SSL spoofing vulnerability has been discovered in w3m. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections made using w3m.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All w3m users should upgrade to the latest version:
